name: Trainer Tarot of Marseilles MR
description:
Here is a simulator for memorizing values of Marseilles Tarot cards.
This is one of the oldest of predictive card decks.
The study of this form of divination is mandatory for those who are seriously into the world of esoteric knowledge.
To make your intuitive search has not turned into wandering from one association to another; you need to have a clear understanding of the basic values of each card in a particular position.
This is a great amount of knowledge, it is difficult to remember and keep in mind.
To simplify the memorization of values and make this process dynamic use my trainer.
